about_the_game: Play through the iconic ‘Casino Night’ Pinball stage inspired by ‘Sonic The Hedgehog 2’, and bring your screen to life with an exclusive theme – no Sonic Generations experience is complete without this exclusive content!
detailed_description: Play through the iconic ‘Casino Night’ Pinball stage inspired by ‘Sonic The Hedgehog 2’, and bring your screen to life with an exclusive theme – no Sonic Generations experience is complete without this exclusive content!
legal_notice: © SEGA. SEGA, the SEGA logo and SONIC GENERATIONS are either registered trademarks or trademarks of SEGA Corporation. All rights reserved.
name: Sonic Generations - Casino Night DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7/Vista/XP
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Dual-Core T4200 (2x2.0GHz) or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2GB RAM (XP)/3GB RAM (Windows 7 / Vista)
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 (512MB) / ATI Radeon HD 2900 (512MB)
  • DirectX®:
  • Hard Drive: 11 GB free hard drive space
  • Sound:
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.66 GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 @ 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 3GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 (1GB) / ATI Radeon HD 5850 (1GB)
  • DirectX®:
  • Hard Drive: 11 GB free hard drive space
  • Sound:

short_description: Play through the iconic ‘Casino Night’ Pinball stage inspired by ‘Sonic The Hedgehog 2’, and bring your screen to life with an exclusive theme – no Sonic Generations experience is complete without this exclusive content!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Italian, Spanish - Spain
